function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased negative attitudes towards public transportation and preference for individual travel modes","Impact":"Reduced usage of public transportation, leading to overcrowding in individual travel modes and increased risk of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Promotion of safe and hygienic public transportation practices, investment in non-motorized transportation systems, and implementation of measures to reduce overcrowding","Technologies":"Hygienic and touchless payment systems, real-time occupancy monitoring for public transportation","People":"Public transportation users, individuals in crowded urban areas","Owner":"Transport authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Increased investment in suburban developments and reliance on private vehicles","Impact":"Greater traffic congestion, increased air pollution, and reduced accessibility to essential services in urban areas","Mitigation":"Development of sustainable suburban transportation systems, promotion of carpooling, and implementation of congestion pricing policies","Technologies":"Smart traffic management systems, carpooling apps, electric and hybrid vehicles","People":"Residents of suburban areas, commuters, environmental organizations","Owner":"Urban planners, transportation agencies, government authorities"},{"Description":"Detrimental impact on well-being and health due to reduced physical activity and social isolation","Impact":"Increased risk of health issues, mental health challenges, and reduced overall well-being","Mitigation":"Promotion of active travel, provision of safe and accessible walking and cycling infrastructure, and implementation of community-based wellness programs","Technologies":"Fitness tracking apps, urban planning for walkable and bikeable communities, telehealth services","People":"Individuals affected by social isolation, communities with limited access to outdoor spaces","Owner":"Local health authorities, community organizations, urban planners"}]}
